title: Data-Driven Inductive Language Learning: Mobile Microlearning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of language structures and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Optimized for office/administrative professionals, beginner-level domain expertise, and mobile-friendly data visualization tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify the top 50 high-frequency words by analyzing data-driven language patterns in mobile environments.
Learners can distinguish context-specific homonym usage rules with 80% accuracy through inductive reasoning.
Learners can derive collocation relationships for 20 job-related vocabulary items using simple language corpus analysis tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
